While VPNs are often used for privacy protection, they’re actually far more than that. With some of them, like NordVPN, you can also protect your devices against malware and keep the investment relatively low.

Why is this important? Well, there are plenty of reasons. Malware infection could also infringe on your privacy or even make your device a milking machine for crypto miners. Additionally, if you’re in a surveillance-ridden country, a VPN will encrypt your traffic and make it unreadable.

Luckily, you can protect both sides of your privacy with NordVPN. This guide will explore how and even let you in on a secret NordVPN Birthday deal, where you can get up to a year of this VPN for FREE.

See At NordVPN

Enjoy 360-degree Privacy & Security

NordVPN offers powerful 256-bit encryption to keep your traffic safe. It also employs a Double VPN, which doubles the said encryption to keep snoopers and ISPs at bay.

This VPN’s appeal lies in its no-log policy, which has received multiple third-party audits. This results in NordVPN retaining no sensitive information on its servers. With this in place, you can browse, stream, and torrent in privacy.

If you choose NordVPN Plus, Complete, or Prime plan, you’ll get Threat Protection Pro. This is where malware blocking comes into play, spiced up by ad-blocking and tracker protection. It works similarly to an antivirus.

You’ll enjoy real-time protection, where NordVPN will prevent malicious downloads and “kill” ads in real time. With this proposition, you’ll avoid third-party tracking and not have your device mine crypto for an unknown entity.

NordVPN also includes browsing protection, helping you avoid phishing attacks and suspicious websites. If you add to that streaming optimization, thousands of P2P servers, and VPN obfuscation, you get an award-winning VPN.
